Go jump in a lake: Measuring the data lake effect on your SIEM

Tech 5 min read

In the article "Go jump in a lake: Measuring the data lake effect on your SIEM," the focus is on how integrating data lakes can enhance the capabilities of Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems. Data lakes offer a scalable, flexible storage framework that can efficiently handle vast amounts of diverse data types, addressing the limitations of traditional SIEM solutions. By leveraging data lakes, organizations can improve data ingestion, storage, and analytics, enabling more effective threat detection and response. The article emphasizes
